page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: To the south and east of People's Park are rows of Victorian terraced houses. There used to be hat factories here and the workers lived in these houses and the factories were between the streets. Now a lot of the area is being redeveloped and light industry has taken the place of the hat factories. To the north of People's Park and Pope's Meadow there are semi-detached and some detached houses. These were built in the middle of the 20th century. It is a good place to live if you want to commute to work in Bedford, Hitchin or Stevenage, or to catch a train to London.
